text: Pilosocereus floccosus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil, in Bahia and Minas Gerais states. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus floccosus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
